dialog.title: Consent Management
dialog.legalDescription: We use cookies/browser's storage to personalize the content and improve user experience. We also might share the data about your site usage with our social media. For more, please review our privacy policy.

banner.title: Let's be clear,
banner.subTitle: we are not croquettes.
banner.subTitle2: To mprove your user experience, this site uses cookies.
banner.description: When you navigate this site save your visit to personalize your content. This allow us to store data to generate statistics of you navidation. Do not worry, you are not in danger. If you want to know more, see our Cookies Policy. Thanks!

forgottenPassword.enterEmailAddressAssociatedWithYourAccou: Enter the email address associated with your account
forgottenPassword.passwordResetEmailSent: An email has been sent to you with information on how to reset your password.
forgottenPassword.passwordResetSuccess: Success! You can now login using your new password.

client.forgotPasswordSubTitle: Don't worry, just enter the email associated with your account and we will send a link to restore your password.

client.subtitle: Just login in order to continue with your purchase.

loginForm.wrongEmailFormat: This is not a valid email format.

register.title: Title
register.emailMarketing: Use my personal data to receive e-mail newsletters for marketing campaigns. To change your settings, go to Consent Management in My Account.
register.confirmThatRead: I am confirming that I have read and agreed with the
register.passwordMinRequirements: Password must be six characters minimum, with one uppercase letter, one number, one symbol
register.postRegisterMessage: Please log in with provided credentials.
register.postRegisterMessageWithInvitation: Congratulations, now your shopping goes hand in hand with our Keff Keff expert: {{associateName}}
register.postRegisterMessageInvalidAssociate: Something went wrong in your registration, verify that the Keff Keff associate that invited you is active.

checkoutLogin.title: Guest
checkoutLogin.subtitle: You can continue as guest only by adding your email.
